title: Blended Competency-Based E-Assessment Design: Mobile Microlearning Application

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Enhancing e-assessment design competencies for project-based evaluations in science fields within BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of e-assessment design that combine competency-based (CBA) and objective-based (OBA) approaches.
Learners can design three or more project-based assessment activities optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can develop assessment rubrics reflecting competency levels and learning objectives for a given scientific topic.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
